data.text:
Published 1:47 am Friday, August 2, 2024

In terms of clinching the MWC title in 2024, the Colorado State Rams rank fourth in the conference, with +1200 odds. In the piece below, we analyze the futures odds and other important data.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on Colorado State Rams’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

Colorado State Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: +1200 (Bet $10 to win $120.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 6.5 (Bet $10 to win $10.00 on the over with +100 odds)

Bet on Colorado State Rams futures odds & games on BetMGM.

Colorado State 2024 Schedule

Colorado State is facing the 73rd-ranked schedule this season (based on its opponents’ combined win total last year). In 2024, the Rams will go head-to-head with seven teams that had winning records last season, including one that won nine or more games, while facing two squads that accumulated three or fewer wins a year ago.

Watch Colorado State Rams games all season long on Fubo!
